articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Prize awarded
    Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly released a decree on awarding  Kim Il Sung Prize to the mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" on June 12.
 The decree says:    
 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly awards Kim Il Sung Prize to the mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang," the greatest masterpiece in the new century which depicts the history of the protracted struggle and exploits of the worker's party and the people of Korea as a grand epic so as to instill great pride and self-confidence of the sun's nation into the Korean people and display the potential of the single-hearted unity of the revolutionary ranks.
